title: Launch of AI-Driven Healthcare Platform
text: Spearheaded the development and launch of a cutting-edge AI platform, reducing diagnostic errors by 15% and increasing patient throughput.

title: Achieved Principal Engineer Promotion
text: Recognized for driving technical excellence and mentoring a team of 10 junior and mid-level software engineers across multiple critical projects.

title: Lead Architect for Global Migration Project
text: Successfully led the migration of all legacy services from on-premise data centers to a fully serverless cloud infrastructure (Azure).

title: Development of Scalable E-commerce API
text: Designed and implemented a high-volume, low-latency e-commerce API using Node.js and MongoDB, handling over 1 million transactions daily.

title: Certification in Advanced Data Analytics
text: Completed intensive training focused on big data processing, visualization, and advanced statistical modeling techniques using R and Tableau.

title: Led Team for Mobile App Redesign
text: Managed a 5-person team to completely redesign and re-launch the flagship mobile application, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement.

title: Implementation of CI/CD Pipeline
text: Introduced and standardized the use of Jenkins and Docker for continuous integration and deployment, cutting deployment time from hours to minutes.

title: Joined as Software Developer
text: Began professional career focusing on front-end development using foundational web technologies and responsive design principles.

title: Completed Master's Degree
text: Obtained a Master's of Science in Computer Engineering, with a thesis focused on machine learning algorithms for pattern recognition.

title: Internship at Research Lab
text: Contributed to a government-funded project involving embedded systems programming and real-time data collection from sensors.

title: Graduated with Bachelor's Degree
text: Received a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science with Honors. Focus on data structures and object-oriented programming.

title: First Programming Competition Win
text: Won the local university-level programming challenge, solving complex algorithmic problems under time pressure.
